sentence: She is among 10 guest speakers — a roster that includes Arizona Republican Reps. Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar and Debbie Lesko — along with Ms. Ward, Alveda King and Mike Lindell, CEO of My Pillow.
author: Jennifer Harper
title: Trump rally brings joy, high-profile guests to Arizona Republicans

sentence: This includes supporting conservative Freedom Caucus members like Reps. Lauren Boebert, R-Colo., and Debbie Lesko, R-Ariz.
author: Jessie Jane Duff
title: Duff: Stefanik Is Results Oriented for Conservatives and it Shows

sentence: "Congresswoman Debbie Lesko is a Conservative Warrior for the people of Arizona," Trump said in a written statement from his Save America political action committee.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: Rep. Debbie Lesko gets Trump's endorsement in bid for another term

sentence: Por su parte, Debbie Lesko, representante de Arizona acusó a la administración de Joe Biden, de eliminarlo y declaró que: “Querer una frontera totalmente para cualquiera y para todos, de cualquier país, en todo el mundo: terroristas, violadores, criminales”.
title: Republicanos de la Cámara dicen que 18,000 migrantes cruzarán la frontera cuando expire Título 42

sentence: https://t.co/aUG6nnPheE — Senator Todd Young (@SenToddYoung) April 4, 2022 “Over TWO million illegal immigrants have crossed into our nation since President Biden took office,” wrote Rep. Debbie Lesko (R-AZ).
author: Joshua Klein
title: Republicans Warn of ‘Biggest Migration Crisis in U.S. History’ as Joe Biden Nixes Title 42
